data.description:
Derby is the best place to meet friends, play ball, and make fun videos.

Enter a social virtual park, unleash your swing and throw heat!

Casually compete with friends in a 1v1, or become a champ on the leaderboards.

Earn Peanuts to spend in the Snack Shack on a rotating selection of swag. 

Become a member to earn exclusive rewards, and craft your own private park to host insane fan lobbies with friends.

Hit dingers, become a star, and change the game! It’s all possible in Derby.

changelog.change_log: Networked catching, new leaderboards, new park info sign, local roster now refreshes, neighborhood has thawed, new daily leader on blimp, new rewards, new Valentine's-themed snack shack skins
Catching now available to My Park Gold members, holiday decor and rewards have left park, updated Snack Shack with OG items, fixed bug where field box could pitch balls to players
PITCHING now available to My Park Gold members, guests of private parks can also use Blimp Club, home runs are restored to field, new message board with better tutorial flyers for new players
New VERSUS MODE, shake bats with another player to challenge them to a 1v1, fixed lag when teleporting inside and back outside the Blimp Club
Blimp club now optimized for broadcasting, music disabled, private park capacity now 13, fixed minor bugs in private park capacity and matchmaking
Members can now access the BLIMP CLUB, new welcome reward for hitting a first HR, updated and improved lighting
New holiday map, free peanut rewards for Happy Homerdays event until New Year, new clipboard, holiday drop in Snack Shack
Added exit velocity, added new grass and dirt terrain, fixed bug where menu wouldn't select sometimes
Optimized shadows and lighting, added Fall snack shack drop
Added new career stats starting with exit velo, added new grass and dirt terrain, added new benches and trash cans
Fall has fallen on the park, hand tracking disabled for improvements, improved stats reliability
DARKNESS FALLS ON THE PARK, new spooky shack bat and hat skins
Optimized neighborhood map, brought back spooky bat skins
Patched GoldDingers reward not calling correctly for members after hitting 100 HR's
Added new park map: The Neighborhood, added community-designed hat and bat skins, added Meta Roster support for easier friending, fixed matchmaking bugs
Added hats to item lockers, added daily peanut rewards for My Park Gold members, added 8 new bat skins, updated moon phase

Added private parks (servers), added My Park Gold subscription to host a private park and invite friends, added group presence for Public/Private parks, updated phase of moon, added back to school bat skins
Ball trails for all players, new ball trail colors, hit sounds for all players, variable hit volume, new geometric bat skins, moon phase updated

New Only Strikes pitching mode, teleport to the mound on the field, look at the home plate, and move hand away to throw (no more force field punching). HR’s now register on the field if a ball is hit past fence and counts towards career stats
Changed Rewards tab to Bat Pass in clipboard, for incoming subscription tiers. Added a full moon to the park. Removed Summer Dogs event decorations. Updated blimp to celebrate new HR leader Yazzy. Brought back 4 requested bats to the Snack Shack. Re-opened the Derby Dog Stand for reactive condiments, fixed a bug where condiments weren’t registering correctly. Optimized performance for moving between glove and hit modes

Left Handed throwing mode in settings, optimized local leaderboards, added last new summer reward, added 4 new bat skins to shop, updated the blimp, RV's and other park assets are on the move, settings in clipboard now save across game launches
